name: Slice n' Dice (RyanRose)
description:
Game created for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam
Fight Hordes of Enemies in a cursed casino with your trusty Dice Sword, after a couple of swings the sword will re-roll and change how you play.

Credits-

Ryan Rose - Project Lead and Programmer

Justin DaSilva - Gameplay Programmer

Marcelo Argão - Gameplay Programmer

Artendy Malik - Enemy Designer

Gabriel Wills 3D Animator/ Generalist

Brendan Embeerson - 3D Animator / Generalist

Charlie Collings - 3D art

Ben Connolly - UX & Graphic Design

Chansu Music - Music Composition

William Bertiz - Sound Design and Programming

Reefat Bakht - Game Design and Tester
